mapper.select: WITH FILTER AS ( SELECT * FROM TB_API_LOGS WHERE CREATE_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) SELECT TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS statDay, RESULT_CODE AS resultCode, COUNT(RESULT_CODE) AS codeCount FROM FILTER GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), RESULT_CODE
